events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
The refund request case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who will handle the process.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll assist you with your refund request. Can you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, please share the order ID and a photo of the item you received.
Sure, my order number is 12345ABC, and I have attached the photo of the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prompt help with my refund!
The refund has been processed successfully and you should see the amount credited in your account shortly.
Checking in to confirm that you received the refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.
Since the refund was received and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
